successes.title: Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone
successes.description: Stream Nostalgia with the Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone.

Pledges.description: :: USA BACKERS :: Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone (WALNUT or MAPLE wood base). Includes Free S&H.  Illinois residents add $24 sales tax. (Retail price: $349).
:: CANADA BACKERS :: Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone (WALNUT or MAPLE wood base). Includes S&H + VAT. (Retail price: $349 + S&H  & VAT).
:: AUSTRALIAN BACKERS :: Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone (WALNUT or MAPLE wood base). Includes S&H. (Retail price: $349 + S&H).
:: SINGAPORE BACKERS :: Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone (WALNUT or MAPLE wood base). Includes S&H. (Retail price: $349 + S&H).
:: EUROPEAN UNION BACKERS :: Gramovox Bluetooth Gramophone (WALNUT or MAPLE wood base). Includes S&H & VAT. (Retail price: $349 + S&H & VAT).
